abstract: Wal-Mart Stores disclosed for the first time its annual contributions to workers’ retirement accounts, profit sharing program and stock purchase plan.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores disclosed for the first time its annual contributions to workers’ retirement accounts, profit sharing program and stock purchase plan.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores, which used to closely guard information about its employee’s pay, disclosed yesterday for the first time its annual contributions to workers’ retirement accounts, profit sharing program and stock purchase plan.
